00024 #include "PeptideDatabase.hpp"
00025 #include "utility/misc/unit.hpp"
00026 #include <iostream>

00029 using namespace std;
00030 using namespace pwiz::util;
00031 using namespace pwiz::proteome;

00033 
00034 ostream* os_ = 0;
00035 
00036 
00037 void compareRecords(const PeptideDatabase* pdb1, const PeptideDatabaseRecord* record1,
00038                     const PeptideDatabase* pdb2, const PeptideDatabaseRecord* record2)
00039 {
00040     unit_assert(record1->id_ipi == record2->id_ipi);
00041     unit_assert(record1->abundance == record2->abundance);
00042     unit_assert(record1->mass == record2->mass);
00043     unit_assert(record1->formula == record2->formula);
00044     unit_assert(pdb1->sequence(*record1) == pdb2->sequence(*record2));
00045 }
00046 
00047 
00048 void test_basic()
00049 {
00050     auto_ptr<PeptideDatabase> pdb = PeptideDatabase::create();
00051 
00052     PeptideDatabaseRecord record;
00053 
00054     record.abundance = 10;
00055     record.mass = 27;
00056     record.formula = PeptideDatabaseFormula(1, 2, 3, 4, 5);
00057     pdb->append(record, "darren");
00058 
00059     record.abundance = 20;
00060     record.mass = 666;
00061     record.formula = PeptideDatabaseFormula(6, 7, 8, 9, 10);
00062     pdb->append(record, "goo");
00063 
00064     unit_assert(pdb->size()==2);
00065    
00066     const PeptideDatabaseRecord* p = pdb->records();
00067     unit_assert(p->abundance == 10);
00068     unit_assert(p->mass == 27);
00069     unit_assert(p->formula.C == 1); 
00070     unit_assert(pdb->sequence(*p) == "darren");
00071     
00072     p++;
00073     unit_assert(p->abundance == 20);
00074     unit_assert(p->mass == 666);
00075     unit_assert(p->formula.C == 6);
00076     unit_assert(p->formula.S == 10);
00077     unit_assert(pdb->sequence(*p) == "goo");
00078      
00079     // iterator interface 
00080     if (os_)
00081         for (PeptideDatabase::iterator it=pdb->begin(); it!=pdb->end(); ++it) 
00082             *os_ << *it << " " << pdb->sequence(*it) << endl;
00083 
00084     // test i/o
00085     string filename = "PeptideDatabaseTest.output.pdb";
00086     pdb->write(filename);
00087     auto_ptr<const PeptideDatabase> pdb2 = PeptideDatabase::create(filename);
00088     unit_assert(pdb2->size() == pdb->size());
00089   
00090     for (int i=0; i<pdb->size(); ++i)
00091     {
00092         const PeptideDatabaseRecord* record1 = pdb->records()+i;
00093         const PeptideDatabaseRecord* record2 = pdb2->records()+i;
00094         compareRecords(pdb.get(), record1, pdb2.get(), record2);
00095     }
00096     
00097     system(("rm " + filename).c_str());
00098 }
00099         
00100         
00101 void test_range()
00102 {
00103     auto_ptr<PeptideDatabase> pdb = PeptideDatabase::create();
00104 
00105     for (int i=0; i<10; i++)
00106     {
00107         PeptideDatabaseRecord record;
00108         record.mass = i;
00109         pdb->append(record);
00110     }
00111 
00112     PeptideDatabase::iterator begin = pdb->begin();
00113     PeptideDatabase::iterator six = pdb->mass_lower_bound(5.5);
00114     PeptideDatabase::iterator eight = pdb->mass_upper_bound(7.5);
00115     unit_assert(six == begin+6);
00116     unit_assert(eight == begin+8);
00117 }
00118 
00119 
00120 int main(int argc, char* argv[])
00121 {
00122 
00123     try
00124     {
00125         if (argc>1 && !strcmp(argv[1],"-v")) os_ = &cout;
00126         if (os_) *os_ << "PeptideDatabaseTest\n";
00127         test_basic();
00128         test_range();
00129         return 0;
00130     }
00131     catch (exception& e)
00132     {
00133         cerr << e.what() << endl;
00134         return 1;
00135     }
00136 }
